channel.title: Pi Multi Barraging
channel.description:
Hey, so i added mutli baraging and something is up when i cast the barrage on more then 1 npc, anfter 2 -3 casts they turn invisable.
The error: [code][24/06/12 1:43 PM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [24/06/12 1:43 PM]: at server.model.npcs.NPC.handleHitMask(NPC.java:271) [24/06/12 1:43 PM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.appendMultiBarra geNPC(CombatAssistant.java:587) [24/06/12 1:43 PM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.delayedHit(Comba tAssistant.java:464) [24/06/12 1:43 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.process(Client.java:1047)
